string-array.name: qutab_minar
string-array.item: Qutub Minar is a minaret that forms part of the Qutb complex, a UNESCO World Heritage Site in the Mehrauli area of Delhi, India.

string-array.name: safdarjang_tomb
string-array.item: Safdarjung s Tomb is a sandstone and marble mausoleum in New Delhi, India.

string-array.name: india_gate
string-array.item: The India Gate, is a war memorial located astride the Rajpath, on the eastern edge of the ‘ceremonial axis’ of New Delhi, India, formerly called Kingsway

string-array.name: humayun_tomb
string-array.item: Humayun s tomb is the tomb of the Mughal Emperor Humayun in Delhi, India.

string-array.name: agrasen_boali
string-array.item: Agrasen ki Baoli is a 60-meter long and 15-meter wide historical step well on Hailey Road [1] near Connaught Place, Jantar Mantar in New Delhi, India.

string-array.name: red_fort
string-array.item: The Red Fort is a historical fort in the city of Delhi in India.It is located in the center of Delhi and houses a number of museums.

string-array.name: akshardham
string-array.item: Akshardham is a Hindu mandir, and a spiritual-cultural campus in New Delhi, India.

string-array.name: lotus_temple
string-array.item: The Lotus Temple, located in Delhi, India, Notable for its Lotus flower shape, it has become a prominent attraction in the city

string-array.name: iskcon_punjabibagh
string-array.item: ISKCON Temple is a well known Vaishnav temple of Lord Krishna and Radharani in the form of Radha Parthasarathi

string-array.name: sisganjsahib
string-array.item: Gurdwara Sis Ganj Sahib, is located at the martyrdom site the ninth Sikh Guru, Guru Tegh Bahadur. Situated in Chandni Chowk in Old Delhi,

string-array.name: banglasahib
string-array.item: Gurudwara Bangla Sahib is one of the most prominent Sikh gurdwara, in Delhi and known for its association with the eighth Sikh Guru, Guru Har Krishan. It is located near Connaught Place

string-array.name: jama_masjid
string-array.item: Jama Masjid , or Masjid-i Jahān-Numā ,built by Mughal emperor Shah Jahan is one of the largest mosques in India.

string-array.name: cp
string-array.item: Connaught Place or CP , is one of the largest financial and business centres in New Delhi.The Outer Circle is known for having rows of restaurants, shops and hotels.There is a National flag at Central Park

string-array.name: chandni_chowk
string-array.item: The Chandni Chowk is one of the oldest and busiest markets in Old Delhi.Chandni Chowk s speciality is its variety and authenticity: food, delicacies and sweets of more than 1,000 kinds.

string-array.name: dlf
string-array.item: DLF Emporio is a high-street shopping mall situated Vasant Kunj. In 2007, it was reported as one of the most expensive malls in the country.it features over 130 brands Like Gucci, Jimmy choo, Versace and tom ford

string-array.name: select_citywalk
string-array.item: Select Citywalk is a shopping mall located in the Saket District Centre, in Saket, New Delhi.It includes a 4 km long multiplex, serviced apartments, offices and public spaces.

string-array.name: hauzkhas
string-array.item: The ‘Village’ offers great restaurants, dive bars, clubs, and shopping boutiques.Historical Places like the Hauz Khas Complex which consists the Hauz Khas Lake

string-array.name: dilli_haat
string-array.item: Dilli Haat is an open-air food plaza and craft bazaar located in Delhi, run by Delhi Tourism and Transportation Development Corporation

string-array.name: modern_art
string-array.item: The NGMA is the premier art gallery under Ministry of Culture, Government of India.Its collection of more than 14,000 works includes works by artists such as Thomas Daniell, Raja Ravi Verma, Rabindranath Tagore.

string-array.name: handloom_handicraft
string-array.item: The National Handicrafts and Handlooms Museum (NHHM) commonly known as National Crafts Museum in New Delhi is one of the largest crafts museums in India.It is run by the Ministry of Textiles, Government of India.

string-array.name: gandhi_smriti
string-array.item: Gandhi Smriti is a museum dedicated to Mahatma Gandhi, situated in New Delhi, India. It is the location where Mahatma Gandhi spent the last 144 days of his life and was assassinated on 30 January 1948

string-array.name: metro_museum
string-array.item: The Metro Museum at Patel Chowk Metro station showcases the genesis, history and journey of the Delhi Metro Rail Corporation (DMRC). India s first modern public transportation system, the Delhi Metro

string-array.name: air_force
string-array.item: The Indian Air Force Museum, Palam, is the museum of the Indian Air Force, and is located at the Palam Air Force Station in Delhi, India. Entrance to the museum is free.

string-array.name: science_center
string-array.item: The National Science Centre established in 1992, is a science museum in Delhi, India. It is part of the National Council of Science Museums (NCSM), an autonomous body under India s Ministry of Culture.
